chunk:
Evanhealy Sanctuary Nectar Balm

Brand: Ref

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosehip (Rosa canina) Seed Oil*, Argan (Argania spinosa) Oil*, Pomegranate (Punica granatum) Seed Oil*, Vanilla* (Vanilla planifolia) Oil, Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis) Oil*, Beeswax (Cera alba)*, Calendula* (Calendula officinalis) infused Olive (Olea

infused Olive (Olea europaea) Oil*, Shea (Butyrospermum parkii) Butter*, Opuntia ficus-indica Seed Oil*, Sea Buckthorn (Hippophae rhamnoides) Fruit Oil*.

Directions: Warm & soften a finger-full of balm with 5-10 sprays of hydrosol in palms of hands. Massage into the skin evenly distributing between cheeks, forehead, chin & any area on the body in

area on the body in need of moisture. Finish with a misting of hydrosol. Use as primary moisturizer or as final occlusive layer after applying oil serum & hydrosol.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
